title: Seeds of Change Organic Quinoa, Brown, & Red Rice

productDetails.description: A nutritious and convenient blend of organic whole grains. This mix of quinoa, brown rice, and red rice is ready in just 90 seconds. It's a perfect side dish or a hearty base for any meal. USDA certified organic and non-GMO.
productDetails.packagingDelivery: Packaged in a sterile, microwavable pouch to preserve freshness and flavor. Shipped in a protective cardboard box.
productDetails.suggestedUse: Squeeze pouch to separate grains. Tear pouch 2 inches to vent. Microwave on high for 90 seconds.
productDetails.otherIngredients: Water, Organic Whole Grain Brown Rice, Organic Red Rice, Organic Black Quinoa, Organic Sunflower Oil, Sea Salt.
productDetails.warnings: Handle with care, pouch will be hot after heating.

vendor.name: Seeds of Change
vendor.vendorsDescription: Seeds of Change is a leading provider of certified organic seeds and food products, committed to promoting sustainable agriculture and healthy eating.
